aboutMe.description: Tanbeer Jubaer is currently pursuing his BSc in Computer Science and Engineering at Rajshahi University of Engineering and Technology. His research interests encompass a broad spectrum, including Natural Language Processing, Digital Humanities, Computational Linguistics, Signal Processing and machine learning. Prior to his educational experience, he worked as a Research Assistant under the supervision of [Md. Harun Or Rashid](https://www.ruet.ac.bd/harunmr9), [Md Azmain Yakin Srizon](https://www.ruet.ac.bd/azmainsrizon) and some other teachers.
quickPreviews: **Research Assistant:** Under supervision of **[Md. Harun Or Rashid](https://www.ruet.ac.bd/harunmr9)**
